alert.note: Alert for Calabasas and Agoura Hills; Central Ventura County Valleys; Santa Clarita Valley; Southeastern Ventura County Valleys; Western San Fernando Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued October 31 at 2:32AM PDT until October 31 at 3:00PM PDT by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM PDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Northeast winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. * WHERE...Santa Clarita Valley, Central Ventura County Valleys, Calabasas and Agoura Hills, Western San Fernando Valley and Southeastern Ventura County Valleys. * WHEN...Until 3 PM PDT this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for drivers of high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Calabasas and Agoura Hills; Central Ventura County Valleys; Santa Clarita Valley; Southeastern Ventura County Valleys; Western San Fernando Valley
